## ðŸš€ Quick Links

### For Users

- **Installation:** `npm install -g @neural-trader/mcp`
- **Claude Desktop Setup:** [Setup Guide](/workspaces/neural-trader/neural-trader-rust/docs/guides/MCP_INTEGRATION.md#claude-desktop-setup)

- **Examples:** [Examples](/workspaces/neural-trader/neural-trader-rust/docs/examples/)
